name: KARDIAC - Sleep Deprivation
description:
PACKAGE DEAL ARE NOW AVAILABLE!!!!!

KARDIAC brings his 5th installment to the table putting in the most work he has ever done for one project. Entirely Written  & Produced  by KARDIAC with Guest appearances by Dj Quietus & Justinfekt

This album is unlike any other, and really raises the bar for music as whole. KARDIAC has really outdone himself on this project. He first-handedly created ALL of the artwork, flawlessly delivered his ALWAYS enticing lyrics, AND produced all of the brutal hard hitting beats leaving nothing but ground up meat. Sleep Deprivation” has tracks to satisfy everyone’s different preferences. 

The album is extremely versatile. This album will dig deep in the subconscious part of the mind, We recommend you to listen to it while your    under some sort of substance or psychotropic's whatever suits your boat. That way you can grasp the mind frame KARDIAC unleased in full effects throughout this entire project sleep deprivation.
We all have been through some kind of sleep deprivation in out lives but from KARDIAC's life & times it really brought out a some horrifying & bizzard encounter displayed throughout the album.

The wide range of topics are consider taboo for any genre of music. At times the emotions expressed throughout the album, would make you wanna break a bottle over someones head. Then there's times when you feel  like      your put right in the story like you were watching it on the big screen. Being Feed though a tube of euphoric sedation drugs. This album has that Horrid gritty KARDIAC element but it gives you something more than that, it gives you something that you can walk away from satisfied. It gives you something real. I guess in a way some what of an understand of KARDIAC  and where he plans to got with  music.

We can't put our fingers on this album. let alone try to figure out what it is living inside it. We suggest up to purchase a copy for yourself and see what you take from it & Spread The Word as always.


-KARDIAC

CD DEAILS:

Album artwork designed by KARDIAC! The CD itself was professionally pressed and comes in a 4 panel eco wallet. For those who are not sure what an Eco wallet is, it'S pretty much like a cardboard sleeve but not as heavy and it folds out into 4 panel booklet.

(ALL PRE-ORDERS WILL BE SHIPPED ON THE 12.27.13 RELEASE DATE VIA USPS FIRST CLASS MAIL. YOU WILL BE ISSUED A TRACKING NUMBER WHICH WILL BE FORWARDED TO THE EMAIL YOU PROVIED AT PURCHASE)

YOUR ORDER INCLUDES A  FREE "SLEEP DEPRIVATION"  20 X 14 SIZE POSTER!

name: THE DEPRIVATION PACKAGE DEALS
description:
THE DEPRIVATION PACKAGE DEALS

PACKAGE DEAL PRE-ORDERS NOW AVAILABLE!!!!!

The Package Deal comes with the full length album by KARDIAC enetitled -Sleep Deprivation,16 track written & produced by KARDIAC as well as the album artwork entirely designed by KARDIAC. With Guest appearance by Justinfekt & Dj Quietus.

The cd itself was professionally pressed and comes in a 4panel eco wallet. For those who are not sure what an Eco wallet is, it'S pretty much like a cardboard sleeve but a lil lighter as in weight. The eco wallet also can folds out into 4panel booklet.

Other Than the CD the highlight of the package deals is a triple printed t-shirt. Designed by KARDIAC. The t-shirts take on a bizarre feel of its own with some of the artwork featured from the album layout. On the front side is a two color "White & Red" on a black t-shirt. With designs like nooses, sleeping pills, roaches, a faceless nun and much more! On the back of the t-shirt is the custom graphics Sleep Dep logo as also shown on the Sleep Dep beanies winter hats. Last but not least on the right sleeve is the Unrestrained Sounds initials US.


Now we couldn't complete a package deal without posters. This time we took things a lil step further and got 20 x 14 size posters which are the biggest size posters KARDIAC Music or Unrestrained have ever pressed up. Also designed by KARDIAC the posters has like a dark blueish tint that really sets the vibe of whats to comes in Sleep Deprivation. So take advantage of this special offer while supplies last.

We Promise its well worth the money and some. plus a greay way to end out the year 2013. Thank you all for you support!

-KARDIAC!


ALL SLEEP DEPRIVATION PRODUCTS SHIP ON FRIDAY DECEMBER THE 27TH FIRST CLASS VIA USPS. POSTERS MUST BE FOLDED IN ORDER TO KEEP DOWN SHIPPING RATES.

name: Sleep Dep - Grunge Beanie Winter Hats
description:
PRE-ORDERS NOW AVAILABLE!!!

Stay warm this winter with your very own Sleep Dep beanie grunge hat. In three different colors "Black, Red & Dark Grey" these hats are on sale for only $3.oo USD. This is a great steal and matches perfectly with one of those Deprivation Pack Deals. So if you picked up a package deal you miswell grab yourself a hat while your at it.

(ALL SLEEP DPERIVATION PROJUCTS WILL BE SHIPPED ON THE 12.27.13 RELEASE DATE VIA USPS FIRST CLASS MAIL. YOU WILL BE ISSUED A TRACKING NUMBER WHICH WILL BE FORWARDED TO THE EMAIL YOU PROVIED AT PURCHASE)

"PLEASE "
[YOU MUST ORDER A CD OR PACKAGE DEAL TO BE ABLE TO GET THE FREE  20 X 14 SLEEP DEPRIVATION POSTER!]

name: Filthography - Thought You Two Were Dead [Ep]
description:
10 years since their last release, Filthography, otherwise known as [Kardiac & E.coli] bring it to the table, switching through numerous styles, and demonstrating an abstract, grim & real sense of the meaning behind Thought You Two Were Dead. 

9 tracks entirely produced by Kardiac, "Thought You Two Were Dead" has a variety of two opposite styles colliding together that any solid fan of either artist could respect. With a wide range of topics such as Violence, Drug addiction, Humor that clashes with moments of abstract randomness contorting an overall reality and seriousness throughout the album. 

So, if you support raw talent and that true gritty underground sound, pickup a copy of Filthography's "Thought You Two Were DEAD." A lot of planning and hard work went into the making of this album. Consider it money well spent on two independent artists that have put the work for years, and have never asked for anything in return except true loyal support. 

EVERY ORDER COMES WITH A FREE 11X17 POSTER SIGNED BY BOTH KARDIAC & E.COLI. IF YOU WOULD LIKE A COPY OF THE ALBUM THAT'S SIGNED BY BOTH ARTISTS, PLEASE MENTION IT IN YOUR ORDER NOTES PLACED THROUGH PAYPAL.

Please Note: We added paypal fees within the shipping total so all our shipping prices have went up by 30¢ to 50¢.

name: PLAY GOD RE-MASTERED 7" INCH VINYL [OUT NOW]
description:
Released 04.24.13 a Hirntrust, Unrestrained Sounds & Kardiac Music collaboration.

This is the very first time KARDIAC's solo music has been brought to wax. Re-mastered on side A.nti is the track "Play God" which is probably one of the most horrific songs KARDIAC has ever written to date. On Side B.eliever is the grimy, cinematic, demonic instrumental for "Play God" produced by KARDIAC. This is a great collector's item even if you do not have a record player. It was made for the true and loyal supporters of KARDIAC MUSIC.

Vinyl Artwork (Front & Back) Created by KARDIAC.
Play God full lyrics displayed on the back of the sleeve.
[Paper sleeve with clear red wax]

Play God was originally released by Kardiac on Unrestrained Sounds later to be pressed and distributed on vinyl by Hirntrust Grind Media, www.hirntrust.at 

[IF YOU WOULD LIKE YOURS SIGNED, PLEASE STATE IT IN A NOTE WHEN YOU PLACE YOUR ORDER VIA PAYPAL]

ALL ORDERS SHIP WITHIN 2 BUSINESS DAYS MON-SAT 
[First Class Mail via USPS]

name: BLOOD HOARDER [Kardiac & Zehl]
description:
Kardiac & Zehl Present: Blood Hoarder

Released 10.26.12 on Unrestrained Sounds:
This album takes you through some harsh realities, and forces you to bear witness to what a brutal death looks like face to face. 

Kardiac's lyrical expertise on this project is golden. He explains the vivid details with which most would say is taking it too far. 

Zehl orchestrates a violent symphony as the onslaught seems to never end. They grip you by the throat, and drag you right into the music. Take a listen and experience what it's like to be a blood hoarder.

Guest Appearances by:

Tyler Guida of Dr.Acula/ My Bitter End

Jakprogresso of Supercoven

Mc.Bushpig of Butchers Harem

Sodoma Gomora

Mc.Cumblood of Butchers Harem

AND MORE
©2012 BMI. All Rights Reserved.

EVERY ORDER INCLUDES A FREE SIGNED BLOOD HOARDER POSTER BY KARDIAC!

[ALL ORDERS SHIP WITHIN 2 BUSINESS DAYS OF MON-SAT]
First Class Mail via USPS

PICK UP OTHER KARDIAC RELEASES FOR DIGITAL DOWNLOAD ONLY AT:
http://kardiac.bandcamp.com

Please Note: We added paypal fees within the shipping total so all our shipping prices have went up by 30¢ to 50¢.

name: THE AFTERNOON OF EXTRAVAGANT DELIGHT
description:
THE 4TH SOLO ALBUM BY KARDIAC!

Released 06.14.11 
After a 4 year Hiatus The monstrosity Known as Kardiac Returns Colliding Modern Horrorcore with a Morbid Sci-Fi Twist. This 16 Track Psychosis Plagues on The Minds Psyche Causing Disorganized Personality Impairments with Very Detailed lyrics Of Death and what it Tastes like.

This is not your ordinary Kardiac album so expect the unexpected as this album tends to venture off out of the norm and into some oddity based morbidities. How far would you go to toy with your own fear?

Guest Appearances by Space of (Night Shift M.D) Caligula & Castrovania aka Castro The Savage.

Production by Zehl Freebass, Veto Mega, Dysphemic, Graham O' Brien and Kardiac.
©2011 BMI. All Rights Reserved.

[ALL ORDERS SHIP WITHIN 2 BUSINESS DAYS OF MON-SAT]
First Class Mail via USPS
